unloaded_config_entry.message: Invalid config entry provided. {config_entry_id} is not loaded.

data.show_archived: Whether sensors should be created for archived packages
data.show_delivered: Whether sensors should be created for delivered packages

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The 17Track YAML configuration import cannot connect to server
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring 17Track using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Things you can try:
Make sure your home assistant can reach the web.

Then restart Home Assistant to try importing this integration again.

Alternatively, you may remove the 17Track configuration from your YAML configuration entirely, restart Home Assistant, and add the 17Track integration manually.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.title: The 17Track YAML configuration import request failed due to invalid authentication
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.description:
Configuring 17Track using YAML is being removed but there were invalid credentials provided while importing your existing configuration.
Setup will not proceed.

Verify that your 17Track credentials are correct and restart Home Assistant to attempt the import again.

Alternatively, you may remove the 17Track configuration from your YAML configuration entirely, restart Home Assistant, and add the 17Track integration manually.

confirm.title: [%key:component::seventeentrack::issues::deprecate_sensor::title%]
confirm.description:
17Track package sensors are deprecated and will be removed.
Please update your automations and scripts to get data using the `seventeentrack.get_packages` service call.

package_state.name: Package states
package_state.description: Only return packages with the specified states. Returns all packages if not specified.

config_entry_id.description: The packages will be retrieved for the selected service.
